courses.title: Introduction to Web Development
courses.description: Learn the basics of web development including HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

courses.title: Advanced JavaScript Techniques
courses.description: Explore advanced JavaScript concepts such as closures, prototypes, and async programming.

courses.description: Become a full stack web developer by learning front-end and back-end technologies.
